0x08000558  0x4805    	LDR	r0, [pc, #0x14]	; 0x08000570
0x0800055a  0x4700    	BX	r0
0x080000c0  0x4803    	LDR	r0, [pc, #0xc]	; 0x080000d0
0x080000c2  0x4685    	MOV	r13, r0
0x080000c4  0xf000fb1e	BL	0x08000704
0x08000704  0x4c06    	LDR	r4, [pc, #0x18]	; 0x08000720
0x08000706  0x2501    	MOVS	r5, #0x01
